channel.title: CVE Feed for opentext -- Service Management Automation X (SMAX)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for opentext -- Service Management Automation X (SMAX)

item.title: CVE-2023-4964|2024-08-02T07:44:53.526Z -- opentext -- service%20management%20automation%20x%20%28smax%29
item.description: Potential open redirect vulnerability in opentext Service Management Automation X (SMAX) versions 2020.05, 2020.08, 2020.11, 2021.02, 2021.05, 2021.08, 2021.11, 2022.05, 2022.11 and opentext Asset Management X (AMX) versions 2021.08, 2021.11, 2022.05, 2022.11. The vulnerability could allow attackers to redirect a user to malicious websites.
